p: We analyzed the 54 differential proteins ( Supplementary Table S3) that were enriched in the ErbB and PI3K–Akt signaling pathways by GO terms biological process enriched via DAVID. The result demonstrated that these proteins were mainly involved in the regulation of protein binding, cytosol, and signal transduction ( Figure 7A). To further understand the interaction between these differential proteins and m 5C regulators, we mapped protein–protein interaction (PPI) networks. The results showed that ALYREF and RPS6 were important connections between differential proteins and m 5C regulators ( Figure 7B).
